item.description: This will be our first long-awaited meetup! I thought I'd wait until long after the confusion of the holidays. Since a lot of books and movies have been mentioned in our emails, I thought I'd make a book & movie list to post on the site. Perhaps more ideas on books & movies could be a topic of conversation? Otherwise this is not meant as a rigid discussion meetup but really a social event so we can meet eachother a talk about whatever comes to our metaphysical minds... However, my metaphysical mind is still having a hard time coming up with a physical place to meet! I'll update as soon as possible!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the Cafe with a bright blue & green scarf around my neck.
item.name: January Meetup
